recipe.name: Toast Sandwich

entries: A toast sandwich is a sandwich made with two slices of bread in which the filling is a thin slice of toasted bread, which can be heavily buttered. An 1861 recipe says to add salt and pepper to taste.

instructions: Toast the filling, then apply the butter to both sides.
Insert the filling between the bread. Salt and pepper to taste.
Serve on a plate, or consume immediately.
